posts.body: Previously, I was using html, css, and javascript to build websites. I heard about React and I'm curious about it. Can someone explain what React is? How is it different from the traditional way of building websites?
I've been using Node.js for a while now. I'm curious about how it works. Can someone explain what Node.js is? How is it different from other backend technologies?
I've been using Angular for a while now. I'm curious about how it works. Can someone explain what Angular is? How is it different from other frontend technologies?
